name: Seek a Way Out
description:
For Kodama Jam Vol. 01 (2019) - "An Isolated World"

Use arrows keys and Z

You can also download the rom if you want to play on real gameboy hardware.

Known issues:

  • No sound, I didn't have time to make music
  • Sometimes the door triggers bug out and you just walk through them, go back and forth to fix it
  • When the game restarts after an ending the variables don't reset, but the other endings are still reachable that way

I'm gonna add credits later.
